gpt_comment: With an average temperature of 26.5°C, Brussels will enjoy plenty of sunshine today according to both OpenWeatherMap and Meteoblue. No rain is predicted by any source, making it a perfect day for outdoor activities. Maybe a good day to visit the Monkey Island at the Brussels Zoo?
